entry.title: BIP-13
entry.summary: In an email dated February 22, 2012 at 11:29:59 AM, Michael Grønager wrote about SCRIPT_ADDRESS_TEST and PUBKEY_ADDRESS_TEST. He noted that the value for SCRIPT_ADDRESS_TEST was 196, or (11000100) in binary. The value for this test network was identified as 11xxxxxx, with xx00xxxx indicating bitcoin and xxxx010y referring to p2sh.In addition, Grønager also included information on PUBKEY_ADDRESS_TEST, which had a value of 111 or (01101111) in binary. No further details were given on this specific address.Gavin, who is mentioned in passing in the conversation, appeared to agree with the information shared by Grønager but did not provide any additional comments or feedback.
